items.title: Audiovisual Rabbit Illusion and multimodal Mismatch Negativity: A Dual Approach to Investigate Multisensory Integration

items.title: Cortical entrainment to the periodic auditory signals modulated by vagus nerve stimulation

items.title: The entrainment to rapid auditory input modulated by vagus nerve stimulation
